TopicTitle: The idea I had this morning over coffee

Articles.Content:
Ok so like every morning I am awoken by my cat at 6:30 AM sharp wanting her breakfast...Spoiled I know.

So I feed her and make the ritual pot of coffee and while watching her eat this idea hit me.

Kerbal Kitty Spacesuit

What is it?

Basically I make her a cat helmet out of an orange (air brushed white with masked off orange of course), modify a white cat sweater to have the booties on it for her paws and a tail extension, Add the KSP red logo and dress he out in it...

No worries she will be perfectly safe and we have no intentions of launching her anywhere.

So what I need is some feedback here as this is meant to be a lol thing

Indeed, it is very actual for effective usage of this:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91835-Reliant-Robin-and-Pinkie-Pie
do it! I'd love to see that.
